moveFreezePea() - Method in class GameState
this method controls movement of each active freeze pea when a freeze pea reaches the zombie it will damage zombie and freeze pea will be removed when a freeze pea reached to end of panel without hitting a zombie it also will be removed!
movePea() - Method in class GameState
this method controls movement of each active pea when a pea reaches the zombie it will damage zombie and the pea will be removed when a pea reached to end of panel without hitting a zombie it also will be removed!
moveZombie() - Method in class GameState
this method is for handling general movement of zombies; first it checks if zombie had reached the end of yard , if it did , uses lawn mowers to kill zombie
